to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~

sentences.english: Here's a close up of these chokes, notice the bubbles.
sentences.chinese: 这有些生锈电感的近照，注意那些气泡。

sentences.english: For Choke Use, Small Molded and Wire Wound Chip Inductors Provide High Current Characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 小型且模造的绕线晶片电感提供高电流的特性。

sentences.english: Pass a current through an inductor, and you create a magnetic flux.
sentences.chinese: 把电流传给电感器，就会产生磁通量。

sentences.english: In contrast, keeping the loaded capacitance constant the loaded inductances were tuned.
sentences.chinese: 反过来，保持加载电容不变，调节加载电感的参数。

sentences.english: The inductor is used to decrease rate of current change.
sentences.chinese: 电感是减少电流变化的续流元件。

sentences.english: The conclusions lay the foundation of chip inductors .
sentences.chinese: 这为贴片电感的制备奠定了基础。

sentences.english: Sound generated by the vibration of laminations in the electromagnetic field that transforms the current for discharge lamp use.
sentences.chinese: 由电感镇流器中铁芯片的震动所产生的声音。

sentences.english: It is a small, high Q value, high-frequency inductors excellent suppliers.
sentences.chinese: 是小型化高Q值，高频电感的优秀供应商。

sentences.english: SC inductance simulation circuit is applied to Colpitts oscillator, Experiments on both inductance simulation circuit and Colpitts oscillator have bean carried out.
sentences.chinese: 设计并实验了开关电容负阻变换器和电感仿真电路。

sentences.english: Measuring principle and constitution of inductive strip centering control system are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 详细介绍了电感式纠偏控制的检测原理及其系统组成。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the eddy-current effect on the inductances is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 同时还讨论了涡流对电感的影响。

sentences.english: Varieties of switching power supply transformers, choke coils, filters, inductors and so on.
sentences.chinese: 各种开关电源用变压器，扼流圈，滤波器，电感等。

sentences.english: This will provide some of the back- ground necessary to making an informed selection of an inductor.
sentences.chinese: 这将提供备用地作出一些必要的电感知情选择。

sentences.english: The spattering can effectively be controlled by increasing inductance in welding circuits.
sentences.chinese: 适当地增大焊接回路的电感，可有效地控制飞溅。

sentences.english: The test of low inductance and dinky and undee factor applies and design.
sentences.chinese: 低电感和极小波形因数的测试应用而设计的。

sentences.english: Two differential inductors with low parasitical capacitance are developed and validated.
sentences.chinese: 设计和验证了低寄生电容的差分电感。

definition: abbr. for 光耦合器[guang1 ou3 he2 qi4]
rectifier (transforming alternating electric current to direct current)
filtering radio waves (i.e. to pick out one frequency)
to rectify (alternating current to direct current)
